name: Garlic Scape Goat Cheese Dip
author: Matt Wencl
summary: Don't resist the garlicky goodness and spring-fresh flavor of this zippy dip! Serve with fresh vegetables or pita chips. If serving later, refrigerate, and pull out of refrigerator 1 hour before serving.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package goat cheese, at room temperature
1 (4 ounce) package cream cheese, at room temperature
6  fresh garlic scapes, minced, or more to taste, divided
directions: Combine goat cheese, cream cheese, 5 garlic scapes, lemon zest, lemon juice, salt, and garlic in a bowl; mix with a fork until blended
Garnish with remaining garlic scape and toasted pecans
